statements: SELECT * FROM RoutePlanning WHERE id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM RoutePlanning WHERE transportation_mode = 'car';
SELECT id, start_location FROM RoutePlanning WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT end_location, traffic_conditions FROM RoutePlanning WHERE transportation_mode = 'bus' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT id, start_location, end_location, transportation_mode FROM RoutePlanning WHERE traffic_conditions = 'heavy traffic' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RoutePlanning WHERE transportation_mode = 'car' ORDER BY distance DESC, traffic_conditions ASC
SELECT id, start_location, end_location FROM RoutePlanning WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM RoutePlanning WHERE start_location LIKE 'New%' AND end_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance, transportation_mode FROM RoutePlanning GROUP BY transportation_mode
SELECT id, start_location, end_location, transportation_mode FROM RoutePlanning WHERE traffic_conditions = 'heavy traffic'
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM Routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM Routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT route_name, estimated_time FROM Routes ORDER BY estimated_time DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM Routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE congestion < 0.5 AND traffic_level='Low';
SELECT route_name, distance, estimated_time FROM Routes WHERE start_point='City A' AND end_point='City B';
SELECT r.route_name, t.traffic_level, t.congestion FROM Routes r INNER JOIN TrafficData t ON r.route_id = t.route_id WHERE t.weather_conditions='Sunny' ORDER BY t.congestion ASC;
SELECT r.route_name, t.traffic_level, t.congestion FROM Routes r LEFT JOIN TrafficData t ON r.route_id = t.route_id WHERE t.route_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM route_planning;
SELECT route_id, source_location, destination_location FROM route_planning WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, distance, travel_time FROM route_planning ORDER BY travel_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(traffic_speed) AS average_speed FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_congestion_level = 2;
SELECT route_id, fuel_cost, tolls_cost, maintenance_cost FROM transportation_expenses WHERE fuel_cost > 50;
SELECT * FROM route_planning;
SELECT route_id, source_location, destination_location, distance FROM route_planning ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT source_location, destination_location, travel_time FROM route_planning WHERE travel_time < 60;
SELECT route_id, traffic_speed, traffic_congestion_level, timestamp FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT expense_id, fuel_cost, tolls_cost, maintenance_cost FROM transportation_expenses WHERE tolls_cost > 20 AND maintenance_cost < 50 ORDER BY expense_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100
SELECT origin, destination FROM Routes WHERE traffic_level = 'high'
SELECT id, travel_time FROM Routes WHERE origin = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance < 50 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT origin, destination, traffic_level FROM Routes WHERE distance > 200 ORDER BY travel_time ASC
SELECT * FROM Routes ORDER BY distance DESC, travel_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE traffic_level='high' OR traffic_level='low'
SELECT id, origin, destination, distance FROM Routes WHERE travel_time > 5 ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT id, destination, travel_time FROM Routes WHERE origin='Los Angeles'
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance > 1000 AND travel_time < 3
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_name, traffic_condition FROM routes WHERE traffic_condition = 'Heavy Traffic' ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE start_location LIKE 'C%' AND end_location LIKE 'W%' ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT route_id, traffic_timestamp, average_speed, traffic_status FROM traffic_data WHERE traffic_status = 'Congested' ORDER BY traffic_timestamp DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, distance, traffic_status FROM routes JOIN traffic_data ON routes.route_id = traffic_data.route_id WHERE traffic_status = 'Congested' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT route_name, traffic_status FROM routes LEFT JOIN traffic_data ON routes.route_id = traffic_data.route_id WHERE traffic_status IS NULL;
SELECT route_name, traffic_status, total_cost FROM routes JOIN expenses ON routes.route_id = expenses.route_id WHERE total_cost > 500 ORDER BY total_cost ASC, route_name DESC;
SELECT optimization_id, route_name, optimization_date, optimized_cost FROM optimizations JOIN routes ON optimizations.route_id = routes.route_id ORDER BY optimization_date DESC, optimized_cost DESC;
